Package src.scenario

Class Summary
AmmoPresetLoader This class will be passed the XML element for reading the ammoPresets information in the scenario file.
ArmorLoader This class will be passed the XML element for reading the armor information in the scenario file.
ArmorPresetLoader This class will be passed the XML element for reading the armorPresets information in the scenario file.
BarLoader This class will be passed the XML element for reading the bars information in the scenario file.
CitySpawnLoader This class will be passed the XML element for reading the city spawn information in the scenario file.
DifficultyLoader This class will be passed the XML element for reading the startingInventory information in the scenario file.
DrinksLoader This class will be passed the XML element for reading the drinks information in the scenario file.
DungeonSpawnLoader This class will be passed the XML element for reading the dungeon spawn information in the scenario file.
EnemyLoader This class will be passed the XML element for reading the enemy information in the scenario file.
ExitTypeLoader This class will be passed the XML element for reading the exit information in the scenario file.
ExplosionDamageLoader This class will be passed the XML element for reading the explosion damage information in the scenario file.
ExplosionImageLoader This class will be passed the XML element for reading the explosionImages information in the scenario file.
GenericPresetLoader This class will be passed the XML element for reading the genericPresets information in the scenario file.
GroundItemsLoader This class will be passed the XML element for reading the ground item information in the scenario file.
HitImagesLoader This class will be passed the XML element for reading the hit images information in the scenario file.
Images This is a singleton class will contain a hash map of BufferedImages.
InventoryLimitsLoader This class will be passed the XML element for reading the inventory limit information in the scenario file.
ItemNameToStoreID Contains a map for store names to their ID numbers.
MagicPresetLoader This class will be passed the XML element for reading the magicPresets information in the scenario file.
MiscScenarioData Class that has public variables used for various scenario data.
NPCLoader This class will be passed the XML element for reading the NPC information in the scenario file.
ObstructionLoader This class will be passed the XML element for reading the obstructionImages information in the scenario file.
PlayerImagesLoader This class will be passed the XML element for reading the player image information in the scenario file.
ScenarioLoader Loads the scenario file into a DOM and parses it to find all of the relevant elements.
ShopkeeperSpawnLoader This class will be passed the XML element for reading the shopkeeper spawn information in the scenario file.
ShopLoader This class will be passed the XML element for reading the shop information in the scenario file.
SoundsLoader This class will be passed the XML element for reading the sounds information in the scenario file.
StartingInventoryLoader This class will be passed the XML element for reading the startingInventory information in the scenario file.
StreetLoader This class will be passed the XML element for reading the street information in the scenario file.
TriggerLoader This class will be passed the XML element for reading the enemy trigger information in the scenario file.
WeaponLoader This class will be passed the XML element for reading the weapon information in the scenario file.
WeaponPresetLoader This class will be passed the XML element for reading the weaponPresets information in the scenario file.
